ds.util
Class BitArray

java.lang.Object
  ds.util.BitArray

public class BitArray
extends java.lang.Object

This class has objects that support bit handling for a large array of bytes.

Constructor Summary
BitArray(int numBits)
          Creates a bit array consisting of numBits bits each having value 0.
BitArray(int[] b)
          Creates a bit array consisting of bit values from the integer array b.

Constructor Detail

BitArray

public BitArray(int numBits)
Creates a bit array consisting of numBits bits each having value 0.

Parameters:
numBits - number of bits in the bit array.

BitArray

public BitArray(int[] b)
Creates a bit array consisting of bit values from the integer array b. Let n = b.length, the bit array has values bit 0: b[0], bit 1; b[1], . . . bit n-1: b[n-1].

Parameters:
b - integer array that initializes bits in the bit array.
